news.title: Emmys 2025: Kendrick Lamar, Beyoncé, Jay-Z, and More Score Nominations
news.summary: Kamasi Washington, Nathan Fielder, Caroline Shaw, the Walkmen’s Hamilton Leithauser, and others also received nominations

news.title: Wilco’s Jeff Tweedy Announces Tour and Triple Album, Shares New Songs: Listen
news.summary: The Chicago musician is previewing the 30-song Twilight Override with “Enough,” “One Tiny Flower,” “Out in the Dark,” and “Stray Cats in Spain”

news.title: Margo Price Announces North American Tour, Shares Video for New Song “Don’t Wake Me Up”: Watch
news.summary: The visual for the second single from Hard Headed Woman pays homage to Bob Dylan’s “Subterranean Homesick Blues”

news.title: Water From Your Eyes Share Video for New Song “Playing Classics”: Watch
news.summary: Another preview of the new album from Nate Amos and Rachel Brown’s experimental pop band

news.title: Nosaj Thing and Jacques Greene Announce Debut Verses GT Album, Share New Song: Listen
news.summary: The longtime collaborators release Verses GT, their first joint full-length, in September

news.title: Fred Armisen Announces New Album 100 Sound Effects
news.summary: The comedian, actor, and musician’s massive collection of sound effects is dedicated to the late Steve Albini

news.title: They Are Gutting a Body of Water Announce Tour and Album, Share Video for New Song: Watch
news.summary: Lotto, the Philadelphia shoegaze band’s fourth studio LP, arrives in the autumn

news.title: David Kaff, Who Played Viv Savage in This Is Spinal Tap, Dies at 79
news.summary: Kaff was the fictional metal band’s keyboardist in Rob Reiner’s 1984 mockumentary
